author: beebeethewonderturtle
title: Awesome
review: Not only is it cool that you can build a watch with Darth Vader on it, but it also has an exclusive Vader minifig with a black head. I strongly suggest it if you are a minifig collector or would really like to have a Lego STAR WARS watch. The Darth Vader comes with black legs, the old chest piece (1999-2007), a black head, a helmet, and a red lightsaber with a chrome hilt.
